strings.basecampEruWelcomeTitle: ERU Basecamp - Admin and Welcome Services
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemOne: Provide administrative support services to the surge team
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemTwo: Provide Welcome Service for in and outgoing delegates
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemThree: Assist and organize briefings, meetings, workshops and trainings together with the existing admin/log structure in place
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemFour: Coordinate small vehicle fleet for admin use
strings.basecampEruEmergencyListItemSix: Help identify facilities, hotels, houses that can be used for accommodation for incoming delegates
strings.compositionValue: Facility Coordinator, Administration person and technicians as per the needs.
strings.specificationsVolumeValue: Customised setup, so depended on the operational needs
strings.specificationsCostValue: Customised setup, dependent on the operational needs
